page.title: 13BENENDEN WEALD, MARKETING.
page.content: The market for milk from Forest Farm has changed recently. The farm does a local milk round once a day, six times a week. An eigth of the farm's milk is sold locally and untreated milk is the most popular. The demand for skimmed milk has increased as more people become concious about healthy diets. Skimmmed milk is used in diets because it has less fat in it. In 1946 when the farm first started this product would not have been sold and would probably only have been used to feed animals. Pasturised milk is also sold. The milk round has been working for two years and has increased rapidly over this time and is continuing to do so . The other seven eighths of the milk is sold at Ashford.
